00027 // ***********************************************************
00028 // Optional Keys used to Pass Data to and from the Helper Tool
00029 // ***********************************************************
00030 
00031 /*
00032  These keys appear in the request and response dictionaries.
00033  You can re-use these in different tasks, or define your own as needed.
00034  These are defined without the "@" prefix so that they can be used in CFSTR()
00035  To use create NSStrings in Cocoa methods, add the "@" prefix.
00036  You may pass any ^serializable^ [1] CoreFoundation object
00037  (CFString, CFNumber, CFBoolean, CFDate, CFData, CFArray, and CFDictionary).
00038  If you wish to pass nonserializable objects you must archive them into a CFData.
00039  Wrapping nonserializable objects into a dictionary or array is not good enough.
00040  [1] http://developer.apple.com/documentation/CoreFoundation/Conceptual/CFPropertyLists/CFPropertyLists.html
00041 */ 
00042 #define kDictionaryPayload      "Payload"                       // CFDictionary of prefs to be set
00043 
00044 #define kBundleIdentifier   "BundleIdentifier"
